name: traffic-control-security-tests
description: Scripts de pruebas de seguridad para el Sistema de Control de Tráfico

scripts.test:auth: node -e "const SecurityTester = require('./security-tests.js'); const t = new SecurityTester(); t.testAuthentication().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => {console.error(e); process.exit(1);});"
scripts.test:rate: node -e "const SecurityTester = require('./security-tests.js'); const t = new SecurityTester(); t.testRateLimiting().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => {console.error(e); process.exit(1);});"
scripts.test:injection: node -e "const SecurityTester = require('./security-tests.js'); const t = new SecurityTester(); t.testSQLInjection().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => {console.error(e); process.exit(1);});"
scripts.test:websocket: node -e "const SecurityTester = require('./security-tests.js'); const t = new SecurityTester(); t.testWebSocketStress().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => {console.error(e); process.exit(1);});"
scripts.test:health: node -e "const SecurityTester = require('./security-tests.js'); const t = new SecurityTester(); t.testServiceHealth().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => {console.error(e); process.exit(1);});"

author: Sistema de Control de Tráfico
